alert.note: Alert for Hamilton (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 06 at 5:38PM EDT until June 06 at 10:00PM EDT by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 845 PM EDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of central Indiana, including the following county, Hamilton. * WHEN...Until 845 PM EDT. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 538 PM EDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the warned area. Up to 2 inches of rain have fallen. - Some roads near Cicero and Westfield have ponding of water on them. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Carmel, Fishers, Noblesville, Westfield, Cicero, Arcadia, Atlanta and Morse Reservoir. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
